name: What's in a Ring?
description:
What's in a Ring? is a joining game for one or more players. In this game, players choose whether or not to accept rings that represent a relationship with oneself or others, and what those rings. Required items are rings (or tokens to represent them), the consent of all players, and the preparation of words in advance of play to be shared during the ritual.

This game is created in celebration of polyamorous love, self love, consent, and commitment, dedicated to Thomas Novosel.
